Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser

Class PowerBlockRelocator

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser.ToolUser
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser.PowerBlockRelocator
public class PowerBlockRelocator extends ToolUser
Represents a tool user that relocates a powerblock to a new position.
Author:
Pim
